meta.description: a full-featured remote-mail retrieval and forwarding utility
meta.long_description:
A full-featured, robust, well-documented remote-mail retrieval and
forwarding utility intended to be used over on-demand TCP/IP links
(such as SLIP or PPP connections). It supports every remote-mail
protocol now in use on the Internet: POP2, POP3, RPOP, APOP, KPOP,
all flavors of IMAP, ETRN, and ODMR. It can even support IPv6 and
IPSEC.
meta.name: fetchmail

meta.description: A full-featured remote-mail retrieval and forwarding utility
